p: At PC12, and again at PC24, 13% of PC participants were terminated from the study, most because of confirmed permanent relocation out of the study community (Table S2), and were censored from further observation; ~75% of remaining participants completed each visit. The final survey (PC36) reached 72% of eligible participants. Retention was similar across study arms at PC36 (73%, 73% and 71% in Arms A, B and C, respectively).
